long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
(In Alpha) Auto create a spreadsheet full of all your grades from GradeScope. No more manually creating excel file after excel file just to keep up with the class. Easily download a preformatted spreadsheet with all your grades preloaded! 

Note: Not all features have been implemented yet. The only offering is a CSV currently.

Note: You may have to enable editing for certain versions of excel.
